member.name: M:Trigonometric.Trigonometry.DegreesTan(System.Double,System.Double@)
member.summary: Performs calculation on degrees to find the tangent.
member.param: The degrees value to find tangent from.
The value of tan to be output after calculation.
member.returns: False if tan(90) is invalid. Otherwise True.

member.name: M:Trigonometric.Trigonometry.DegreesSin(System.Double)
member.summary: Performs calculation on degrees to find the sine.
member.param: The degree value to find sine from.

member.name: M:Trigonometric.Trigonometry.DegreesCos(System.Double)
member.summary: Performs calculation on degrees to find the cosine.
member.param: The Degree value to find cosine from.

member.name: M:Trigonometric.Trigonometry.ConvertToRadians(System.Double)
member.returns: The Radian equivalent to the degrees inputted.
